content: I wanted to go back and ask something about the -- about what you're seeing in the ground game and if there was a little bit of an uptick there we saw in 3Q, I guess, I'm really interested -- how much of it not -- obviously, you've given the guide for 4Q but how much of that of your 4Q guide is, are you expecting to see an uptick in more opportunities to elect in the wells or participate where other people now -- I think you mentioned this in your press release but I wanted to get an idea of the magnitude.
